title: my hextech triumph
body:
so i bought 6 chests and keys and got omega teemo and skt1 zyra, not to shabby but i also got a gemstone, being that i dont play annie or vayne im like fuck it no point collecting them, forge it into a chest and key, bam eternum nocturne and another gemstone, im like but can i do better? forge the gemstone then boom...... fuck i feel lucky

http://s1190.photobucket.com/user/Tom_Smoodger/media/sdasdadasad_zpsm2ztv9jc.jpg.html?sort=3&o=0

(the one on the left is the noc skin)

i dont even own vayne kek

replies.body:
First time i got gemstone:

Didn't know what it was.
Immediately turned it into key and chest and turned that skin into orange shards

I got teemo champion and threw up in my mouth.

You did better than me.

I rerolled a gemstone and I got Mordekaiser. 20 Minutes later I found out that Soulstealer Vayne and the Hextech Ward Skin were coming out soon. I got another gemstone recently but I'm not confident I'll be as lucky as you ; )
yeah, probably better to just gather them up, i only forge them because i dont play annie or vayne, but now that i have this i might have to buy vayne.

Holy shit! thats so epic haha

Damnnnn I haven't gotten a gem stone in so long
i was over the moon, then i realised i dont even own vayne feelsbadman
I got three 520 skins and a 1350, and rerolled the 3 for Buccaneer Tristana. Close enough.
Lol i was actually happier i got the teemo skin
